products.title: Focaccia
products.description: Italian flatbread made from a base similar to pizza dough that can be either sweet or savoury. The dough of focaccia is flavoured with olive oil and sometimes topped with herbs, vegetables and other ingredients like raisins or olives.

products.title: Baguette
products.description: A long, thin loaf of French bread with a crisp crust and chewy interior, ideal for sandwiches or serving with soup.

products.title: Croissant
products.description: A buttery, flaky, crescent-shaped pastry, typically enjoyed for breakfast or as a snack.

products.title: Chocolate Croissant
products.description: A croissant filled with rich chocolate, offering a delightful combination of flakiness and sweetness.

products.title: Apple Danish
products.description: A Danish pastry filled with sweet apple filling, perfect for a morning treat or dessert.

products.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
products.description: A classic comfort food made with melted cheese between slices of toasted bread.

products.title: Turkey Club Sandwich
products.description: A triple-decker sandwich with layers of sliced turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

products.title: Gingerbread Cookies
products.description: Delicious cookies flavored with ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves, perfect for the holiday season.

products.title: Yule Log Cake
products.description: A festive dessert made of rolled sponge cake filled with cream and decorated to resemble a log.

products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: Espresso combined with steamed milk foam, topped with a dusting of cocoa powder or cinnamon.

products.title: Iced Tea
products.description: Chilled tea served over ice, available in a variety of flavors including lemon, peach, and raspberry.

products.title: Potato Chips
products.description: Thin slices of potato fried until crisp and seasoned with salt, perfect for snacking.

products.title: Mixed Nuts
products.description: A blend of roasted nuts, including almonds, cashews, walnuts, and pecans, offering a satisfying crunch.
